biography: Matti, a name whispered with a mix of respect and a touch of wistful longing in the golfing circles of the Hector Trophée. Though officially retired from the fray, the memory of Matti's presence on the course lingers, a testament to the indelible mark he left.

A man of quiet intensity, Matti always approached the game with a focused determination, a trait that both endeared him to his partners and intimidated his rivals. While success at the highest level eluded him, his two appearances at the Hector Trophée were marked by moments of brilliance and strategic acumen.
Though Matti may not be competing in Hector Trophée 2025, his spirit of sportsmanship and dedication to the game continue to inspire those who had the privilege of witnessing his play.
